mapper.insert:
insert into sync_schedule( id, property_id, start_time, end_time, priority, completed, count, pull_millis, save_millis, total_millis ) values
( #{schedule.id}, #{schedule.propertyId}, #{schedule.startTime}, #{schedule.endTime}, #{schedule.priority}, #{schedule.completed}, #{schedule.count}, #{schedule.pullMillis}, #{schedule.saveMillis}, #{schedule.totalMillis} )
